abilities.description: Upgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your hero..

additionalInformation: Granted to one of the two lowest networth heroes within the team upon defeating a Tormentor.
If all heroes have their Ability Upgrade already, each player gains gold and experience instead.
The item grants each hero unique enhancements to their abilities, sometimes granting a new ability.
name: Aghanim's Shard - Roshan
description: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.
trivia: This item was originally dropped by Roshan on its second death as a reward prior to the 7.33 gameply patch. This can still be seen in the item's name, which was not updated once it was changed to be a reward from Tormentors instead.
